text: The South African Roller Hockey Championship is the biggest Roller Hockey Regions Championship in South Africa. ==Regions to compete in the last Season== The regions that competed in the season of 2011 were Northerns, Central, Vaal and Easterns. ===List of Winners=== {| class="wikitable" |- !Year !Host City !Men's !Women's !Juniors !Juveniles !Infants |- |2012 |Pretoria |Northerns |Central |Central |Central |Vaal |- |2011 |Vanderbijlpark |Northerns |Vaal |Central |Easterns |Vaal |- |2010 |Pretoria |Northerns |Central |Easterns |Easterns |Vaal |} ===Number of Men's Senior Championships by Region=== {| class="wikitable" |- !Team !Championships |- |Northern |3 |} ==References== ==External links== ===South African websites=== * South African Roller Hockey Federation *Associação Portuguesa de Futebol Cultura e Recreio (APFCR) ===International=== *O Seculo Newspaper * Roller Hockey links worldwide * Mundook-World Roller Hockey *Hardballhock-World Roller Hockey *Inforoller World Roller Hockey * World Roller Hockey Blog *rink-hockey-news - World Roller Hockey *HoqueiPatins.cat - World Roller Hockey Category:Roller hockey in South Africa Roller Hockey South Africa
title: South African Roller Hockey Championship
